alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA, SOUTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING AND NORTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Togo, or 30 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Togo around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Meadow Brook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
